tool.name: Add genes to MSGF+ table
tool.description: from an SQLite lookup table with PSMs and FASTA database

param.name: lookup
param.label: Lookup file containing PSMs and gene names, symbols etc.

tool.help: This tool outputs gene names and symbols into a PSM table that contains protein IDs such as the tabular output from MSGF+. The lookup where the gene info is from has to be made with the mslookup tool for that.
